title: Bedcover, 1780–1790
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave
creditline: Gift of W. and J. Sloane
description: Chintz bedcover composed of a large central panel and two end pieces that have been stitched on. Floral pattern printed in red, blue and deep purple on a white ground.
